data.me.regexp

Class REDebugCompiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.me.regexp.RECompiler
      • data.me.regexp.REDebugCompiler

  • public class REDebugCompiler
extends RECompiler
    A subclass of RECompiler which can dump a regular expression program for debugging purposes.
    Author:
    Jonathan Locke
